fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Destructive: Your Hand Size is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. You may disguise as any role at any point during the game, and this disguise affects up to Susceptible checks. 
- Cloak: All of your attacks will appear to come from random players. You may choose to deactivate and reactivate this passive at any moment.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a Special card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Copycat: Choose a player. Copy one of their non-Unique abilities in its original state if possible (Recharging abilities included). Learn what role they are (True). [3 uses] 
- Pound: Deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to someone at the end of the phase. Gains a use for every other person you Kill. [1 use, Recharging, 0/2]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
